DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate and compare the incidence of the postoperative sore throat between LMA supreme and I-gel.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of LMA-Supreme and I-gel for the Incidence of Postoperative Sore Throat
DOC.criteria: adult patients aged over 19 years who are scheduled for elective surgery under general anesthesia using the laryngeal mask airway Anticipated difficult airway Expected duration of surgery more than 4 hours body mass index more than 35 kg/m2 pregnancy Upper gastrointestinal surgery or open abdominal surgery.
